definition: to cover/to wrap/to hold/to include/to take charge of/to contract (to or for)/package/wrapper/container/bag/to hold or embrace/bundle/packet/CL:個|个[ge4],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: The effects of the optical beam width and cladding on imaging are analysed.
sentences.chinese: 分析了光束束宽和包层对成像的影响。

sentences.english: The existing vegetation is also referenced, by the spotted gum cladding on each of the buildings.
sentences.chinese: 通过每座建筑上的斑桉包层，现有植被也被引用。

sentences.english: The capper comes equipped with an elevator cap feeder and with 304 stainless steel cladding as standard.
sentences.chinese: 该封口机配备电梯封盖机和304不锈钢包层为标准。

sentences.english: It had a metal skeleton and a series of gasbags inside an outer covering.
sentences.chinese: 这种飞艇在外包层里面装有一副金属骨架和许多气囊。

sentences.english: The language of the composition is enhanced by using natural local stone in claddings.
sentences.chinese: 包层使用了当地天然石材，增强了建筑的自然气息。

sentences.english: Manipulates documents in the package layer that deal with the physical storage directly.
sentences.chinese: 在包层操作文档，直接访问物理存储。

sentences.english: The shift of the resonance wavelength has some difference for different kinds of metal.
sentences.chinese: 不同金属包层，谐振波长的偏移量也有一定差别。

sentences.english: Metal coated long period fiber gratings (LPFG) can be used to change the resonance wavelength.
sentences.chinese: 金属包层长周期光纤光栅可用于对谐振波长的调谐。

sentences.english: In Chapter 3, fiber Bragg grating fabricated with cladding mode suppression fiber is studied.
sentences.chinese: 第三章研究用包层模抑制光纤制作的光纤布拉格光栅。

sentences.english: This layer is hereafter referred to as the package layer in this article.
sentences.chinese: 后面把这一层称为包层。

sentences.english: Proper wrapping layers of plastic tensile membranes are 4.
sentences.chinese: 拉伸膜捆包层数以4层为宜。
